extensionDescription.message: Estimate your CO₂ when you write an email

composeActionTitle.description: Title of the button to open the popup in compose menu.

composePopupTitle.message: Estimation of the environmental impact of the sending of this email

composePopupHeader.message: Estimation of the global environmental impact of this email

composePopupExplanationIntro1.message: The following are taken into account: manufacturing electrical and electronic equipment (EEE), sending and storing, transmitting, treating, receiving, using, and the end-of-life of EEE.

composePopupExplanationIntro2.message: For more information, please see the references:

composePopupSizesRecipientsWarning.message: Is it necessary to send this email to that many addresses?

composePopupRecommendations.message: Some recommendations to reduce one's impact

composeSignature.message: {0}According to the extension {1}, sending this email of {2} to {3} recipient{4} results in the indirect emission of {5} CO{6}e. This corresponds to the consumption of {7} of petroleum, the travel of {8} by car or {9} by TGV, the use of a light bulb of {10} W during {11}, or the breathing of a human being during {12}.{13}Sources: ADEME's base carbone® (2017 à 2020), ADEME (2011), Zhang et al. (2011).{14}

browserActionTitle.description: Title of the button to open the popup in browser menu.

preferencesValuesIntro.message: Below are the values used to estimate the equivalences.

equivalencesTgv.message: Distance travelled by a person by TGV

equivalencesBulb.message: Time of use of a light bulb of

reminder1.message: Remember to delete your emails regularly, especially those containing attachments.

reminder2.message: Consider using memory sticks or file transfer tools instead of emailing them.

reminder3.message: Avoid replacing your numerical equipment on a whim or following a promotional offer.

reminder4.message: Prioritize repair over replacement in the event of a breakdown.

reminder5.message: Favour giving or exchanging rather than replacing equipment.

reminder6.message: Remember to turn off your devices if you are not using them instead of putting them on standby.

reminder7.message: Limit the number of recipients when sending emails.

reminder8.message: Only print what is needed and when needed.

reminder9.message: Do not keep your old electronic devices; take them to a reseller.

reminder10.message: Unsubscribe from mailing lists that no longer interest you.

reminder11.message: Only keep what is useful to you both online and on your equipment.

reminder12.message: Optimise the size of the files you transmit by using compressed and low definition files.

reminderTitle.message: Estimate your CO₂ — Bi-monthly Friendly Reminder
